header: Immanuel Is the Answer to Judah’s Hardness

verse: This took place in the days when Ahaz, the son of Jotham, the son of Uzziah, was king of Judah. Rezin king of Aram, and Pekah son of Remaliah, the king of Israel, marched up to Jerusalem to wage war against it, but they could not capture it.
The house of David was told, “Aram has allied itself with Ephraim.” The heart of Ahaz trembled, and the heart of his people trembled as the trees of the forest tremble in the wind.
Then the Lord said to Isaiah:
The Lord spoke to Ahaz again. He said,
“Ask for a sign from the Lord your God. Ask for it either in the depths below or in the heights above.”
But Ahaz responded, “I will not ask. I will not test the Lord.”
